price.pricingPolicyText: "Regular" (REG.) and "Original" (ORIG.) prices are offering prices. That means we offered the merchandise in our stores or on macys.com at those prices; however, we may not have sold the item at that price. So, the savings we show from these prices may not be based on actual sales of the item. Some "Original" (ORIG.) prices may not have been in effect during the past 90 days.

notes: Returns are accepted at any Macy's store within 180 days from purchase date. Last Act items must be returned within 30 days from purchase date.

returnConstraints.returnInstruction: Return to any Store or mail to CFC Goodyear

attributeValues.value: Bandage-style pleating conforms to your figure on this elegantly fitted dress with a peekaboo hem, from Calvin Klein.
Model is approximately 5'10" and wears a size 2
V-neckline; hidden back zipper with hook-and-eye closure
Allover bandage pleating; illusion insets at hem
Returns are accepted at any Macy's store within 180 days from purchase date. Last Act items must be returned within 30 days from purchase date.
To purchase furniture, please call us toll free at 1-800-BUY-MACYS Monday-Friday, 9am-9pm, Saturday 9am-7pm and Sunday 11am-7pm to place your order.
